title: Vieira: Refs made 'huge' mistake | Redknapp: VAR got it wrong
shortDescription: Patrick Vieira criticised the performance of the referees in Crystal Palace's 3-1 defeat to Liverpool, pointing to two goals he felt should have been chalked off.

title: Arteta wants signings but January window 'complicated'
shortDescription: Mikel Arteta is still hopeful Arsenal will bring in new signings this month but admits the January transfer window is proving "complicated".

title: Kane goal controversially ruled out!
shortDescription: Harry Kane thought he had put Tottenham ahead against Chelsea but it was chalked off for a foul on Thiago Silva in the build-up.

title: Liverpool secure three points at Palace
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool's win over Crystal Palace in the Premier League.

title: Liverpool edge past Palace to keep Man City in their sights
shortDescription: Liverpool edged to a nervy 3-1 victory against Crystal Palace on Super Sunday, keeping Manchester City in their sights at the top of the Premier League table.

title: Welbeck strikes late to earn Brighton draw
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Leicester's draw with Brighton in the Premier League.

title: Welbeck's header earns Brighton draw at Leicester
shortDescription: Danny Welbeck's powerful late header cancelled out Patson Daka's opener as Leicester and Brighton drew 1-1.

title: Arsenal frustrated as Burnley hang on
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from the goalless draw between Arsenal and Burnley in the Premier League.

title: Stubborn Burnley frustrate Arsenal
shortDescription: Arsenal lost ground in the race for the top four as they were held to a goalless draw by Burnley at the Emirates Stadium.

title: Brentford close to finalising Eriksen deal
shortDescription: Brentford are close to finalising terms on a six-month contract with Christian Eriksen.

title: Covid outbreak forces Comoros to use outfield player in goal vs Cameroon
shortDescription: The Comoros Islands will have to use an outfield player in goal against hosts Cameroon in the Africa Cup of Nations after a Covid outbreak in the squad.

title: Will Conte bring Spurs success? Keane & panel disagree
shortDescription: Roy Keane, Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink discuss the impact that Antonio Conte has had on Tottenham and their chances of finishing in the top four.

title: Sunday's fixtures and results
shortDescription: Keep up to date with all the action from both home and across the continent, with the likes of Real Madrid, Bayern, PSG and Barcelona all playing today...

title: Man Utd's Turner out indefinitely with 'artery issue'
shortDescription: Manchester United Women's Millie Turner is out for an "indefinite period" due to an issue with the artery in her neck.

title: Celtic captain McGregor suffers 'significant' facial injury
shortDescription: Ange Postecoglou revealed captain Callum McGregor picked up a "significant" facial injury in Celtic's 2-1 Scottish Cup win against Alloa.
